title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education         The most popular education program is a tipi pitch. The kids get a chance to put up and then take down a tipi. Nez Perce National Historical Park  Nez Perce National Historical Park offers a unique opportunity to learn about a people and culture that has been part of this land for thousands of years. To experience this special place, we have provided all of the information that you need to schedule a program and get information on how to use the story of the Nez Perce in your classroom. Enjoy your visit!
